constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: CONARA Name: Christ Church Conservation Area
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: Non Material Amendment to Planning Permission 18/00213/FUL (Demolition of existing 8 garages to rear. Erection of new building comprising of 2 x 2 bed residential units with roof space accommodation, including associated car parking and landscaping.) for proposed obscured windows for ground floor W/C's on both plots.
decision_conditions: The Council considers the amendments to be non- material and as such, it is recommended that a S96A application for a non-material amendment to be granted

The applicant has provided sufficient details for Conditions 4 (Cycle Parking), 5 (Refuse), 6 (Energy and Sustainability) and 7 (Boundaries) of planning permission 20/02673/FUL for officers to be satisfied that carried out in accordance with the details submitted the approved development would accord with policies  SI17 and T5 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS1,CS6, CS8, DM3, DM4, DM8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012

Please provide proposed roof plan at a recognised scale (at 1:50 or 1:100 for example), showing the outline of entire property not just part and showing dimensions of proposed work. The plans must show the direction of North. Although the inclusion of a scale bar is not mandatory, it is highly encouraged.
